subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal has won 29 straight matches dating to a loss at the Rome Masters in May, including victories over Roger Federer at the French Open and Wimbledon.
snippet: Rafael Nadal has won 29 straight matches dating to a loss at the Rome Masters in May, including victories over Roger Federer at the French Open and Wimbledon.
